title: ARAM Game
body:
Hello,

Would anybody like to play an ARAM game?  :D

Game Name: Riot ThEntropist's game
Password: aram

Let's play and chat! {{champion:432}}

replies.body: Thx for the game! I was {{champion:268}}

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Fury,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=xIgTNNLE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-19T07:39:03.493+0000)
>
> I looked up your game and didn't find it.  
> 
> Bummer :-/

probably took less than a minute to fill it up

> [{quoted}](name=PogChampEleGiggl,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=xIgTNNLE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-19T07:41:11.295+0000)
>
> probably took less than a minute to fill it up

Nah I joined. Copy/Paste didn't work so I just typed Riot and found it. :D
